Docs.param: The ID of the channel to validate, typically extracted from the activity's property, that to which the Activity is affinitized.

The JWT token’s signing party is permitted to send activities only for specific channels. That list, the set of channels the service can sign for, is called the the endorsement list. The activity’s MUST be found in the endorsement list, or the incoming activity is not considered valid.
Docs.summary: Verify that a channel matches the endorsements found on the JWT token. For example, if an comes from WebChat, that activity's property is set to "webchat" and the signing party of the JWT token must have a corresponding endorsement of “Webchat”.
Docs.returns: True if the channel ID is found in the endorsements list; otherwise, false.
